pr_title: SONARJAVA-3298 S2755 FN when two factories are used in the same method

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3298 S2755 FN when two factories are used in the same method
Refactor code to avoid extra interface
Migrate test file to checks-test module

timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.bodyText:
Isn't this method the same as in:
https://github.com/SonarSource/sonar-java/pull/2819/files#diff-ad75e35ac7cb0aad007e6d9e495bbae8R127
Maybe you can make it static and public, outside of the inner class, to be reused from the outsilde-
timeline.author: m-g-sonar
m-g-sonar

timeline.bodyText: javadoc is missing for this part. If it's required to call it at some point, then document why.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.bodyText: Could you take the opportunity to move the test file into the new module?
